content:
I have 50 errors like this in the continuous build of fhir-order-catalog IG:
image.png
The latest QA is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-order-catalog/branches/master/qa.html
This error is systematic and has been there for quite a while on this IG. Can someone tell me what is wrong?
The IG also has systematic warnings on $validate-code, which do not make sense to me:
image.png
I see that @John Moehrke had reported the same warnings (topic "terminology oddity"). In my case I have more than 100 such warnings, on terminologies SNOMED CT and LOINC. So how can I resolve this?
in my case they went away. Attributed to the instability that occationally happens with the terminology server. Try poking the build again.
Yes, it may be worth a try again. The terminology server has just been freshly restarted.
